title.narrative: Support to Indonesia Multi Stakeholder Forest Governance Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Support to Indonesia Multi Stakeholder Forest Governance Programme) is a component of Forest Governance, Markets and Climate reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £20,580,559. This component benefits Indonesia, and works in the following sector(s): Advanced technical and managerial training, Public sector policy and administrative management, Anti-corruption organisations and institutions, Business Policy and Administration, Forestry policy and administrative management, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Trade facilitation, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: LTS International Ltd, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-04-2014 and the end date is 31-03-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
